info.name: Julia Ruiz Borys
info.interests: Systems-thinking, Human-centric design, Sustainability, Contemporary art, Animation, Food

highlights: Styled, directed & edited Marshalls’ Instagram Stories.
Created complete illustration deck for Winter Social Campaign.
Designed typography & color pallate for Wellness Social Campaign.
Ideated, designed, and presented stills & animations for Marshalls websites & social media using After Effects, Photoshop, and InDesign.
Supported designers by assembling presentation decks, creating photoshop mock-ups, and physical comps.
Created and managed social media assets.
Worked with CEO and COO to create initial marketing strategy.
Built & iterated first versions of help.okta.com info architecture.
Designed, prototyped, & tested automation tool for the Release Notes editing & publishing process, increasing efficiency by 300%.
Introduced design-thinking practices for Info-Dev team scalability.
Published weekly Release Notes with software updates & bug fixes.
Wrote customer-facing documentation for Okta Mobile Dev teams.
Collaborated with another artist to create a logo for KissyPig, a recording studio in Boston, MA using the Creative Suite
Organized a 5K in the form of a scavenger hunt, that promoted exercise and required donations to the Food Bank for eligibility
Redesigned the menu and ambient of Jazzy Burgers, a local diner

education.area: Candidate for Bachelor of Science Degree in Business Administration
education.awards: University Scholars Program: Full tuition scholarship awarded to top 1% of students on basis of academic achievement, leadership, and service.
education.activities: Latin American Student Organization (LASO) Executive Board, San Francisco Co-op Connector

list: Intermediate: Adobe Creative Cloud (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign)
Expert: Social Media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Tumblr
